# functions.rsm.activity_pred { #spotdesirability.functions.rsm.activity_pred }

```python
functions.rsm.activity_pred(x)
```

Predicts the thermal activity based on the input vector x.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                | Description                                  | Default    |
|--------|---------------------|----------------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | list or numpy array | A vector of three input values [x1, x2, x3]. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type             | Description                     |
|--------|------------------|---------------------------------|
| float  | [float](`float`) | The predicted thermal activity. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```{python}
from spotdesirability.functions.rsm import activity_pred
x = [1.0, 2.0, 3.0]
activity = activity_pred(x)
print(activity)
```
